get.summary: List gists for the authenticated user
get.description: Lists the authenticated user's gists or if called anonymously, this endpoint returns all public gists:

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Only show results that were last updated after the given time. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100). For more information, see "[Using pagination in the REST API](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-cloud@latest//rest/using-the-rest-api/using-pagination-in-the-rest-api)."

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of the results to fetch. For more information, see "[Using pagination in the REST API](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-cloud@latest//rest/using-the-rest-api/using-pagination-in-the-rest-api)."

post.description:
Allows you to add a new gist with one or more files.

> [!NOTE]
> Don't name your files "gistfile" with a numerical suffix. This is the format of the automatic naming scheme that Gist uses internally.

files.description: Names and content for the files that make up the gist

public.description: Flag indicating whether the gist is public

201.description: Successful response containing the created gist.

Location.description: The URL of the newly created gist.

422.description: Validation failed. The input provided was not valid.

304.description: Not modified. The resource has not changed since the last request.

404.description: Not found. The specified resource could not be found.

403.description: Forbidden. The request is understood, but it has been refused or access is not allowed.

delete.description: Deletes a specified gist, identified by its ID.

parameters.name: gist_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the gist.

204.description: No content. The gist was successfully deleted and there is no additional content to send.

404.description: Not found. The specified gist could not be found.

304.description: Not modified. The resource has not changed since the last request.

403.description: Forbidden. The request is understood, but it has been refused or access is not allowed.

get.description: Gets a gist. Supports `application/vnd.github.raw+json` for raw markdown (default) and `application/vnd.github.base64+json` for base64 (for invalid UTF-8). See '[Media types](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-cloud@latest/rest/using-the-rest-api/getting-started-with-the-rest-api#media-types)'.

parameters.name: gist_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the gist.

200.description: Successful response containing the requested gist details.

403.description: Forbidden. The request is understood, but it has been refused or access is not allowed.

404.description: Not found. The specified gist could not be found.

304.description: Not modified. The resource has not changed since the last request.

patch.description: Update a gist's description, and update, delete, or rename files. Unchanged files remain. Requires `description` or `files`. Supports `application/vnd.github.raw+json` (raw markdown, default) and `application/vnd.github.base64+json` (base64 for invalid UTF-8).

parameters.name: gist_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the gist.

files.description:
The gist files to be updated, renamed, or deleted. Each `key` must match the current filename (including extension) of the targeted gist file. For example: `hello.py`.

To delete a file, set the whole file to null. For example: `hello.py : null`. The file will also be deleted if the specified object does not contain at least one of `content` or `filename`.

content.description: The new content of the file.

filename.description: The new filename for the file.

200.description: Successful response containing the updated gist.

422.description: Validation failed. The input provided was not valid.

404.description: Not found. The specified gist could not be found.

encoding.description: The encoding used for `content`. Currently, `"utf-8"` and `"base64"` are supported.

gist-comment.title: Gist Comment
gist-comment.description: A comment made to a gist.

encoding.description: The encoding used for `content`. Currently, `"utf-8"` and `"base64"` are supported.

author-association.title: author_association
author-association.description: How the author is associated with the repository.

validation_failed.description: Validation failed, or the endpoint has been spammed.

comment-id.name: comment_id
comment-id.description: The unique identifier of the comment.

value.body: Just commenting for the sake of commenting
Just commenting for the sake of commenting
